definition: Story of Yanxi Palace (2018 TV series)

sentences.english: Record the newly-weds honeymoon trip tips and the equipment information.
sentences.chinese: 記錄新婚夫婦蜜月旅程的攻略和裝備信息。

sentences.english: The first station on real significance is station of strategy of a game.
sentences.chinese: 真正意義上的第一個站是一個遊戲攻略站。

sentences.english: This Guide is basically for high-score purpose.
sentences.chinese: 此攻略基本上爲追求高分數而設。

sentences.english: This guide is based on a balanced 3 group position.
sentences.chinese: 這份攻略基於將團隊分爲3堆的站位方法。
是他們寫的那些旅遊攻略。

sentences.english: Qin saw the opportunity, first with Qi Lianheng, Wei introduction of large tracts of land.
sentences.chinese: 秦國看準時機，先與齊連橫，攻略魏國大片土地。

definition: canonical text/treasury (i.e. book of treasured wisdom)
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial

dried food (including dried fruits, mushrooms and seafoods such as shrimp and abalone)/(fig.) (coll.) knowledge presented in readily assimilable form/just what you want to know: no more, no less (no 水分[shui3 fen1])
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
